Text: Giving the finger is typical of the so-called "science" of HIV--no honest debate.  People who push the HIV = Aids theory do so with no information.  Dr. Duesberg was nominated for the Nobel prize for his work in retroviruses.  If you want to believe that HIV causes AIDs and that drugs invented to fight cancer but were too toxic can combat this, go right ahead.  You are free to do so.  The monied establishment that is making billions off of this scam thanks you.  They don't blink an eye when it wipes out your bone marrow however.  Chumps.
